column4: shaddox: photoshop refuses to release their products for linux. so you'll have to adjust to a program called "the gimp" which installed by default, and runs just as well as photoshop, albeit differently.
shaddox: the biggest thing is: don't get hooked on proprietary software, and you'll never have to worry about switching EVER.
Shaddox : try using PhotoShop on linux using CrossOver
